IndustryType: Wholesale and retail storage and distribution (excluding LPG)

Title: Loss of containement of 100 kg of piperidine
LessonsLearned: <ul><li>More consistent formation of temporary workers</li><li>No more temporary workers put the first day to work during night shifts</li></ul><ul><li>Better access on safety information about the products in transit: <span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">all goods</span> <span class="hps">in transit</span> <span class="hps">warehouses</span> <span class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">security</span> <span class="hps"></span></span><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">Tremcards</span> <span class="hps">are available.</span> goods (</span><span class="">Tremcards</span> are <span class="hps">stored</span> <span class="hps">in the</span> <span class="hps">cabin</span> <span class="hps">of the vehicle)</span><span MSDS<span class="hps"></span> <span class="hps">seems like a good</span> <span class="hps">solution.</span></span></li><li><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">More EmergencyResponce_Descr: <span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span style="" title="Oralement, les team leaders ont fait évacuer le hall TSA.">Orally, the team leaders evacuated the transhipment hall. </span><span style="" title="M. Emmermann est entré dans la remorque du camion pour aller constater les dégâts.">A team leader entered the trailer of the truck to check the damage. </span><span style="" title="Les team leaders se sont alors équipés de masque à cartouches et de bottes afin d'intervenir dans le camion.">The team leaders then fitted mask cartridges and boots in order to intervene in the truck. </span><span style="" title="Ces équipements étaient à disposition dans une des 3 armoires présentes sur place (2 dans le hall et 1 dans les bureaux administratifs de la TSA)."></span><span style="" title="Trois équipiers de première intervention (M. Emmermann, J. Raxhon et M. Grandrath) sont entrés dans le camion, ont placé le fût endommagé dans un sur-fût, ont sorti ce dernier du camion et ont disposé du sable sur le produit répandu">These internal intervention team entered the truck, placed the damaged drum in a oversized drum, took it out of the truck and scattered sand on the spill </span><span style="" title="dans le camion.">in the truck. </span><span style="" title="Le sur-fût fermé a été placé à l'entrée du hall TSA, à l'extérieur.">The oversized drum was closed and placed at the entrance hall outside. </span><span style="" title="Une partie du liquide s'est retrouvé dans l'avaloir situé sous les quais de chargement, cet avaloir est relié au bassin de rétention.">Some of the liquid was found in the drain beneath the loading docks, the drain is connected to the retention basin.<br><br></span><span style="" title="Le conseiller en prévention est alors arrivé sur place.">The prevention advisor then arrived on the spot. </span><span style="" title="On a alors procédé à l'identification du produit incriminé: comme il s'agissait d'un fût en transit (arrivé le 23/05/2011, stocké temporairement dans le hall TSA et départ le 24/05/2011), les seules">The intervention team proceeded then to the identification of the product in the drum: it was a drum in transit (arrived on 23/05/2011, stored temporarily in the hall and departure on 24/05/2011), the only </span><span style="" title="informations à disposition sur le produit sont celles reprises sur la lettre de voiture CMR (mais qui n'était pas directement à disposition (voir copie jointe au dossier)) et sur l'étiquette du fût lui-même.">information available on the product was those listed on the CMR (but the CMR was not directly available) and on the label on the drum itself. </span><span style="" title="Le nom du produit, piperidine, a alors été repéré sur le fût lui-même.">The product name, piperidine, was then spotted on the barrel itself. </span><span style="" title="Le conseiller en prévention a alors recherché la fiche MSDS dans le système informatique de TDG Mond via un ordinateur des bureaux administratifs de la TSA, mais sans succès et ensuite via internet, mais sans succès également car l'accès à internet n'était pas possible">The prevention advisor then searched the MSDS in the computer system via a computer in the administrative office of the transhipment hall, but without success and then via internet, but without success also because Internet access was not possible </span><span title=".">. </span><span style="" title="Il est alors allé dans les bureaux administratifs principaux se trouvant à l'autre bout du site.">He then went into the main administrative offices located at the other end of the site. </span><span style="" title="Il est revenu avec la fiche MSDS du produit trouvée sur internet (voir copie jointe au dossier).">He returned with the MSDS of the product found on the Internet.<br><br></span><span style="" title="La piperidine est un liquide facilement inflammable (point d'éclair= 16°C), toxique par inhalation et toxique pour la peau (R11, R23, R24 et R34)."></span><span style="" title="En concertation avec les équipiers de première intervention, il a été décidé de ne pas intervenir pour la suite des opérations (dilution et évacuation du produit restant avec de l'eau du réseau incendie vers le bassin de rétention), mais de faire appel au SRI">In consultation with the internal intervention team, it was decided not to continue the intervention (dilution and removal of the remaining product with water to the fire retention pond), but to call to the external fire departement</span><span title="via le 112.">.<br><br></span><span style="" title="L'accueil des pompiers a alors été préparé et un périmètre de sécurité en interne a été mis en place (notamment pour empêcher l'accès des camions au site).">A security perimeter was internally created (notably to prevent truck access to the site).<br><br></span><span style="" title="Le conseiller en prévention a accueilli les pompiers (plusieurs SRI sont arrivés sur place) et a assuré le lien avec les services de secours.">The prevention advisor welcomed the firefighters and provided the link with the emergency services. </span><span style="" title="Les pompiers ont alors établis leur poste de commandement (PC Ops) à l'arrière des halls N et P.">Firefighters then established their command post.</span><span style="" title="d'oedème pulmonaire)."><br><br></span><span style="" title="La cellule chimique a été déployée par le SRI et une stratégie d'intervention a été mise en place: un binôme équipé de combinaisons chimiques et d'appareils respiratoires autonomes a alors été envoyé en reconnaissance, avant de mettre en place l'intervention proprement dite">The chemical intervention cell was deployed by the fire departement and an intervention strategy was put in place: two firemen equipped with </span></span><span id="result_box" class="short_text" lang="en"><span class="hps">chemical proof</span> <span class="hps">overalls and </span></span><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span style="" title="La cellule chimique a été déployée par le SRI et une stratégie d'intervention a été mise en place: un binôme équipé de combinaisons chimiques et d'appareils respiratoires autonomes a alors été envoyé en reconnaissance, avant de mettre en place l'intervention proprement dite">breathing apparatus was then sent into the truck in reconnaissance, before setting up the actual response </span><span title=": nettoyage du camion, rinçage et dilution du produit.">: cleaning the truck, rinsing and dilution.<br><br></span><span style="" title="Un périmètre de sécurité a été mis en place par la police autour du site.">A security perimeter was set up by police around the site during these operations.<br><br></span></span><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">It remained necessary to</span> <span class="hps">remove</span> <span class="hps">the diluted product</span> that was<span class="hps"> collected in the</span> <span class="hps">retention pond</span><span>:</span> <span class="hps">there was a</span> <span class="hps">consultation with the client</span> <span class="hps">on residual risks</span> <span class="hps">of the product</span> <span class="hps">diluted with water</span> <span class="hps">and finally</span> <span class="hps">a</span> <span class="hps">test was performed</span> <span class="hps">on a sample</span> <span class="hps">of the mixture</span> <span class="hps">water</span> <span class="hps">+</span> <span class="hps">product to determine</span> <span class="hps">if the mixture</span> <span class="hps">was still</span> <span class="hps">flammable.</span> <span class="hps">As this</span> <span class="hps">was not the case</span><span class="">, the mixture</span> <span class="hps">could be</span> <span class="hps">pumped into</span> <span class="hps">a tanker truck</span> <span class="hps">and</span> <span class="hps">then be</span> removed<span class="hps">.</span></span><br><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span style="" title="Un périmètre de sécurité a été mis en place par la police autour du site."><br></span><span style="" title="En parallèle, les différents responsables de l'entreprise ont été appelés: Luc Vansimpsen, Jean-Marc Wiesen, William Fabry, Guy Mertens."><br></span></span>

Reasons.ItemDescription: Substances involved: greater than 5% of quantity in Column 3 of Annex I
Injury to persons: >= 1 fatalities, >= 6 hospitalizing injuries etc.
Immediate damage to the environment (according to Annex VI)

ADFireMajors.ItemDescription: pool fire (burning pool of liquid, contained or uncontained)
jet flame (burning jet of fluid from orifice)
flash fire (burning vapour cloud, subsonic flame front)
fireball (burning mass rising in air, often after BLEVE)

P4. OXIDISING GASES

P5b. FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS  cat. 2 or 3  creating hazard conditions (n. 12)

with</span> <span class="hps">his</span> <span class="hps">forklift with</span> <span class="hps">the forks</span> <span class="hps">positioned</span> <span class="hps">about 55</span> <span it.<br><br></span></span><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">The warehouse worker</span> <span class="hps">was</span> <span class="hps">a</span> <span class="hps">temporary worker</span><span>.</span> <span class="hps">He had</span> <span class="hps">been</span> <span class="hps">directly</span> <span class="hps">employed</span> <span class="hps">to the post of</span> <span class="hps">storekeeper</span> <span class="hps">in the night shift </span><span class="hps atn">(</span><span class="">17:00-</span> <span class="hps">1:30</span><span class="">).</span> <span class="hps">It was also his</span> <span class="hps">first day of work</span> <span class="hps">on the site.</span></span> <br><br><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">In addition,</span> <span class="hps">the colleague</span> <span class="hps"></span><span class="hps">was not</span> <span class="hps">an experienced worker</span><span>,</span> <span class="hps">he was also a</span> <span class="hps">new worker</span><span class="">, in function</span> <span class="hps">only</span> <span class="hps">for a month</span> <span class="hps">and a half</span> <span Consequence_Description: <span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">Loss of containment</span> <span class="hps">of</span> <span class="hps">just over</span> <span class="hps">100 kg</span> <span class="hps">of piperidine</span><span class="">,</span> <span class="hps">flammable</span> <span class="hps">and toxic</span> <span class="hps">by inhalation and</span> <span class="hps">contact</span><span>:</span> <span class="hps">leak</span> <span class="hps">contained and</span> <span class="hps">removed by</span> <span class="hps">dilution and</span> <span class="hps">removal</span> <span class="hps">of the mixture</span> <span class="hps">and</span> <span class="hps">absorption</span> with <span class="hps">sand.</span><br><br> <span class="hps">Seven</span> <span class="hps">workers</span> <span class="hps">were hospitalized</span> <span class="hps">preventively</span> <span class="hps">for 36</span> <span class="hps">h</span><span>, they</span> <span class="hps">remained</span> <span class="hps">under observation</span> <span class="hps">because there is a</span> <span class="hps">risk of developing</span> <span class="hps">pulmonary oedema</span> <span class="hps">with this substance.</span> <span class="hps">Finally,</span> <span class="hps">there is no</span> <span class="hps">lesion</span> <span class="hps">seen for</span> these <span class="hps">seven</span> <span class="hps atn">people.<br>These workers were:<br>- the 2 operators loading the truck who were exposed when the drum was pierced.<br>- 3 people of the internal intervention team who explored the situation whithout resperatory protection <br>- 2 people who were in the neighbourhood<br><br>Evacuation of the whole site and </span></span><span id="result_box" class="" lang="en"><span class="hps">a security perimeter</span> <span class="hps">was</span> <span class="hps">set up</span> <span class="hps">by police</span> <span class="hps">around the site.</span></span>
